C

checks - Variable in class org.project.Tokenizer
Enables class methods to take punctuation and current words into account.
client - Variable in class org.project.APISource
This is used to actually connect to the API endpoint.
client - Variable in class org.project.HTTPClient
This is the HTTP client.
closeConnection() - Method in class org.project.HTTPClient
This method checks to see if the connection is open and then closes it.
commonWords - Variable in class org.project.Tokenizer
Allows the methods to know which words should be considered when checking for common words.
connect(URL) - Method in class org.project.HTTPClient
This method is used to connect the set HTTP client with a given site URL.
connected - Variable in class org.project.HTTPClient
This variable is used to tell whether the Client is connected or not in a given moment .
CORRECT_STATUS - Variable in class org.project.HTTPClient
This is the value of a correctly initialized connection.
CSV_EXSTENSION - Static variable in class org.project.Main
Extension of CSV formatted file.
CSV_PATH - Static variable in class org.project.Main
Relative path to where the CSV files are stored.
CSVArticle - Class in org.project
This class represents the fields that are used in the CSV source to represent an Article.
CSVArticle(String, String, String, URL, String, String, String) - Constructor for class org.project.CSVArticle
This constructor is used to set all the fields.
CSVParser - Class in org.project
This class elaborates the content of a CSV file extracting a List of Articles.
CSVParser() - Constructor for class org.project.CSVParser
This constructor is used to initialize the list of articles.
CSVSource - Class in org.project
This class represents a source of articles which are read from a CSV file.
CSVSource(String) - Constructor for class org.project.CSVSource
This constructor initialize the CSVParser with the filepath passed as an argument and the articles with the fields read in the CSV file.
currentPage - Variable in class org.project.APIParser
This is the current page out of a maximum APIParser.total.
